name: Dungeon of Deadly Desserts
description:
Hack and slash your way through this sweet roguelike dungeon crawl in a world made of desserts and sweets. You are a gingerbread warrior venturing into the procedurally-generated cake mines to find the cause of the demented pastries that spew forth from within.

Made in a week for #CherryJam. It's still a bit rough. Plenty of features I didn't get to make, and it's not quite there yet aesthetically. But that's the nature of game jams!More features to come after the jam, someday.

Instructions:

  • Find the exit to the next level without being defeated by the pastries that lurk in the dungeon.
  • Collect as much candy as you can. (Not implemented yet: Level up and candy counter).
  • Lollipops will heal you a little bit.

Controls:

  • Aim: Move mouse cursor. The gingerbread warrior will automatically face the cursor.
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys.
  • Attack with Sword: Left Mouse Button or Z key.
  • Shield Block and Bash: Right Mouse Button or X key. (This will push back your foes and reflect enemy projectiles too.)
  • Restart: R key
  • Pause: P key
  • Quit: Escape Key

Attributions:

  • Music:  Dragon and Toast, by Kevin MacLeod, Creative Commons by Attribution 3.0.
  • Voice Acting: Wanni Wang
  • Other sound effects: Sonniss GDC 2017 Game Audio Bundle and UniversalSoundFX bundle.

Tools: Unity, Blender, Substance Painter, Gimp, Audacity
